summary:
Retex of Daedric:
Armor set
Sword
and Bow
descriptionHtml:
well... it´s gettin a little chaotic now.. so i post all stuff other than daedric in different \"mods\"
but i´m still making new retex an link them all together :)=
done:
-Dragonbone set - http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4147
-Dragonscale set - http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4144
-Daedric Armor set
--Bow
--Sword

btw, i keep the old description as well 
___________________________________________________________
hey there!
i present you my first skyrim mod. it is just a simple retex. i recommend using it with \"Daedric Armor and Weapon Glow Replacer\"
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3682
i prefer the green one

btw bare with me if my english is a bit rusty^^
author: Murtagh
